title: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: When using the XML Edit Data Set dialog, the filter information is not persisting after closing and reopening the dialog.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should persist the filter information, allowing users to set a plain XPath expression (with the path from the data set selector itself) and retain this filter even after closing the dialog.
SR:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter a plain XPath expression with the path from the data set selector.
3. Apply a filter as needed.
4. Close the dialog.
5. Reopen the dialog, and verify that the filter information is still present.
